member.name: T:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt
member.summary: Extensions methods for DateUtils object.

member.summary: Returns the last date of month of a date.

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.FirstDayOfMonth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the first date of month of a date.

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.IsAfter(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Test if a DateTime object is After an other.
member.param: the date to test is after
member.returns: true if date is after anotehrDate. False if not, or equals

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.IsBefore(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Test if a DateTime object is before an other.
member.param: the date to test is before
member.returns: true if date is before anothe rDate. False if not, or equals

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.ChangeDate(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Return a new instance of DateTime, with date part (year, month, day) taken form another DateTime. Time preserved from original.
member.param: the new DateTime to take date part
member.returns: A new instance of DateTime, with date part (year, month, day)

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.ChangeTime(System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Change time part of a DateTime object.
member.returns: A new DateTime object, with time part changed

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.DateUtilsExt.ChangeTime(System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Change time part of a DateTime object.
member.param: the TimeSpan object to take time part
member.returns: A new DateTime object, with time part changed

member.name: T:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.StringUtilsExt

member.name: M:AryxDevLibrary.extensions.StringUtilsExt.Truncate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncate the string.

member.returns: The string with replacement done if exists.

member.summary: Gets the relative path of a file based on a reference folder.

member.returns: the relative path of a file based on a reference folder
member.example: filepath="C:\Windows\media\Windows Print complete.wav" and folder="C:\Users". Result will be : ..\Windows\media\Windows Print complete.wav
